snippet.title: Grapple Bear trailer 2019
snippet.description:
You can Pre-Order Grapple Bear on IOS before the release on 26th February 2019
http://bit.ly/Grapple_Bear_IOS

Grapple Bear is an all hand-drawn 2D platformer game with easy to get into but hard to master game mechanics. You control a cute bear with a grappling hook through the hand-crafted levels to reach the flag while avoiding traps in the environment. Grapple Bear saves your best run as a ghost player to encourage you to be the fastest you can be on each level. Suitable for speedrunners and people who just want to play games offline on the go. 

Grapple Bear is made as a solo development project by Dani Prokisch at Bright Hand Studio.

www.brighthandstudio.com

Music:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Heftone_Banjo_Orchestra/Music_Box_Rag/

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

webshop:
http://bit.ly/ProkischDev_webShop
